attributes.action: Please ask the TV & radio stations to stop saying 'His family has been informed'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
or 'her family' too.
Everybody knows that as soon as there is a death in the current conflict the next of kin are told within hours and well before the media are told. 
This makes the phrase 'The family has been informed' superfluous as everybody knows they have been informed and this makes it both unnecessary and very annoying!

rejection.details: The Government do not control editorial decisions made by TV and radio stations.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
